Casengo is customer support software, crm, webcare and live chat software for webshops, e-commerce websites, and small businesses. Casengo supports email, livechat, social media, faq, self service and online chat. Check the Casengo Customer Support and Live Chat FAQ page for answers to frequently asked questions, and how to get Casengo customer support software, live-chat, and helpdesk software going. The blog for anyone interested in customer support, customer service, live chat, social CRM, small business tips and Casengo product updates.
